short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify the X video link and share it in a new tweet easily just by mentioning the author.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Social Media Presence with "Picky Bird"

Say goodbye to cluttered retweets and hello to sleek, author-attributed video posts with "Picky Bird," the Chrome extension that's changing the game for video sharing on platform X. Our innovative feature ensures that when you share a video, it's not just another retweet lost in the crowd. Instead, "Picky Bird" creates a clean and attractive mention of the original author, streamlining your posts and making them stand out.

The "Picky Bird" Advantage:

Attractive Posts: By focusing on the author's mention, "Picky Bird" ensures your shared videos look less like repetitive retweets and more like curated content that aligns with your personal or brand image.
Enhanced Engagement: Clean and clear posts are more likely to capture attention, encouraging higher engagement from your audience.
User-Friendly Sharing: With the clutter cut out, your followers can enjoy the content you share without distractions, leading to a more comfortable browsing experience.
Streamlined Aesthetics: "Picky Bird" helps maintain a consistent and organized look on your profile or page, which is essential for creating a strong and recognizable online presence.
